title: Total Number of Locomotives Assigned to Freight and Passenger Service for United States
notes:
Switching And Terminal Companies Are Excluded Through 1936. They Were Included Beginning In 1937. The Figure For January 1937 Was Derived By Adding The 12/1936 Figure (Excluding The Companies) And The 01/1937 Figure (Including Them) And Dividing By Two. Source: Computed By NBER By Adding Series (Locomotives Assigned To Freight And Passenger Service, Respectively).

This NBER data series m01273 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 1 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter01.html.

NBER Indicator: m01273
